abstract: How to convert your Wi-Fi tablet into something that can go online anywhere.
snippet: How to convert your Wi-Fi tablet into something that can go online anywhere.
lead_paragraph: Q. I have an Android tablet that can connect to the Internet only through Wi-Fi. Can I get a 3G chip for it to use the phone data networks too?

headline.main: Q&A: A Wi-Fi Tablet in a 3G World
